p: Other antiviral treatments for COVID-19 currently undergoing clinical trials include protease inhibitors (nelfinavir, camostat mesilate, ritonavir, danoprevir, darunavir, flavopiridol, relacatib), nucleoside analogues (galidesivir), fusion inhibitors (umifenovir), RNA polymerase inhibitors (favipiravir), and neuraminidase inhibitors (oseltamivir). 76
